detail_desc: Calf-length satin skirt with narrow elastication at the waist, a slit in one side and embroidery at the hem. Unlined.
Semi shiny tights that shape the tummy, thighs and calves, while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 70 denier.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a round neckline.
Small handbag in woven fabric with a sheen. Short, adjustable shoulder strap with metal eyelets and a large metal buckle. Zip at the top. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 23 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Small handbag with a handle and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 4.5 cm. Height 14 cm. Width 27.5 cm.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a snap lock and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 9x12x17 cm.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
T-shirt in ribbed jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Fake pocket at the top, welt front pockets with a flap, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and a detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with elastication around the top and long sleeves.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.
Shirt in a washed linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib knit with a foldover edge at the top and long sleeves.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a slit at the top and a zip at the bottom of one side. Faux fur linings and insoles, and chunky soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft knit.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Joggers in soft fleece with a motif, elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in a lightweight cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, elastication and a wide flounce at the top with broderie anglaise, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print and terry motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. Deep V-neck, ties at the neckline, long wide raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Pool shoes with a fabric strap and hook and loop fastening (sizes 7-9 with a strap around the heel). Fluted rubber soles.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Turtleneck top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Low-necked vest top in soft linen jersey.
Short, A-line dress in jersey with a round neckline and V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties. Long, voluminous raglan sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Metal chain necklace decorated with small, round discs. Adjustable length.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Spotted plastic earrings with hoop pendants. Length 5.5 cm.
LIMITED EDITION. Satin hairband with a decorative double bow at the front and covered elastic at the back. The bow is decorated with sequins.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Double-layered front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

Sleeveless, pumpkin-shaped fancy dress costume in lightly padded cotton jersey. Appliqués around the front of the neckline, a hook and loop fastening at the back of the neck and a print motif on the front.
Double-layered hat in jersey with a glittery pattern.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, zipped coin pockets and skinny legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.

Short skirt in sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, pockets in the side seams and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Printed vest top with narrow ribbing around the neckline and armholes.

Blouse in crisp cotton poplin with a V-neck at the front and square neckline at the back. Wrapover front with ties at one side and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the shoulders and hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slim legs with creases.
Fully lined, jacquard-patterned bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Short skirt in washed denim with embroidery. Zip at the back.
Leggings in different colours of washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slightly shorter, wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dressing gown in satin with a wrapover front, ties at the sides, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Cardigan in soft fine knit with embroidery and buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in thick pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave with elastication and a frill trim at the waist, side pockets with a small frill trim and wide straight legs.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit hat in a soft blend of mulberry silk and cotton with a roll-edge hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), and narrow hems.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck with decorative ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Partly lined.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Mittens in woven fabric with pile sections and elastication at the wrists. Size 2-6M without thumbs. Fleece lining.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Metal rings in various designs, three of which are decorated with a patterned plastic stone.
Cardigan in a premium cotton knit with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long dress in a crinkled weave with lacing at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a wide skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Short chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed funnel collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
